Room.Name: Ranger Training Location
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached the training location for Rangers levels one and two.
Room.LongDescription: If you are a level one or level two searcher, you may train here to advance to the next level. After you finish your training here, you will need to seek out the next training location to advance to the level of scout. Do this by practicing your tracking skills out of the tree you came in from.
